name: Bartle, Appellant, v. Zoning Board of Adjustment
name_abbreviation: Bartle v. Zoning Board of Adjustment

judges: 1957. Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Ci-iidsby, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
parties: Bartle, Appellant, v. Zoning Board of Adjustment.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
The order of the court below dismissing the appeal from the decision of the zoning board of adjustment is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Brown, 10 Pa. D. & C. 2d 613.
Order affirmed.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: Murray II. Shusterman, Deputy City Solicitor, with him Gordon Cavanaugh, Assistant City Solicitor, and David Berger, City Solicitor, for City of Philadelphia, appellee.
Frank F. Truscott, with him John V. Koran and Trommer, Silver & Barsky, for intervening defendant, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:

Argued November 19,

Murray II. Shusterman, Deputy City Solicitor, with him Gordon Cavanaugh, Assistant City Solicitor, and David Berger, City Solicitor, for City of Philadelphia, appellee.

January 8, 1958:
